docna.cdata!:
Philippines - Jalaur Irrigation Project :
            Loan 1367 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Philippines - Jalaur Irrigation
            Project : Loan 1367 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

19094931.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Jalaur Multipurpose Irrigation
            Project includes: (a) rehabilitation of four existing NIA
            irrigation and drainage systems serving a total area of
            about 22,000 ha; (b) construction of new irrigation and
            drainage facilities for about 2,700 ha of rainfed rice
            lands; (c) construction of a project headquarters building
            and facilities for Operation and Management; (d) technical
            assistance to NIA for further studies on the expansion of
            the project; (e) procurement of vehicles and equipment; and
            (f) water management training program.
